name: Fire Department
description:
New Year is a giant celebration. And everybody loves fireworks. Sadly on New Years Eve there a lot of fires caused by Christmas Decoration and Fireworks.

Take control of Steve, the fireman and go around the Neighbourhood putting out fires!

You can use your fire truck to move faster.

You move with the WASD keys. Left click to start spraying water from your hose. Press E to enter the firetruck.

You don't have much time to save the Neighbourhood!
